result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ غَدَوۡتَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مَقَٰعِدَ لِلۡقِتَالِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
result.translation: 121. Nabiyow isi Buxak ucud deqsita Aracâ fanah moominiin Qeebih elle gactii wayta Arooca keenih Bicisak tewqc waqdi cus;Yalli sin maxcooca yaabbi sin taamoomi yaaxigi kinni.
